column4: hi i need an application to refresh my ip,i need also an application to manage a ftp server what can i install? why many times i don't ear the sound at all or i see a video very slow...?
what do you mean "refresh your ip". you mean dynamic ip? you neeed to update a domain name?
yeah like mydns
if you're using a service for that dns, like dyndns.com they will provide you with a daemon you can run on your machine. which service is it?
i need to do that to manage a ftp server on my machine
i like filezilla server... can i find the sources i need or...which program could i use for that purpose?
go to synaptic: type "dyndns"
which program could i use ? can i find filezilla server Dr_Willis?
you know it can be dangerous running services like that on the web, right? i'm not sure about filezilla, you'd be better off looking it up. i use vsftpd
vsftpd is just a different program. i think you should read up on security first though, if you're not aware of the dangfers of the nakey-web
its as safe as you make it. i can use vsftpd and make a nasty swarm hole of attraction at my house with it
swarm=just not good
what dr_willis said, its very very much worth learning first
any protection for what exactly?
yes there is, which comes with learning.
ftp = just like anything else. ftp is just one method of getting files.
erusual++
you can create anything you want.
yes
read the links that were printed out ^ above
yes?
do you know how to get to the terminal?
